short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Support product insights, historical trends view, keyword research, review download and many more handy features.
short.zh_CN: 支持产品洞察, 历史趋势查看, 关键词调研, 评论下载, 索引收录查询和利润计算等实用功能

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension greatly improves the efficiency for sellers who do product research on Amazon, it provides bunch of simple tools such as download all reviews in 1 click, as well as download q&a, download main images/videos, download A+ images, show all product details in one single block etc, all these stop sellers from doing the tedious work and help save tons of time.
long.zh_CN: 卖家通过插件调研亚马逊市场和产品，包括查看预估销量，查看商品的历史价格趋势，查看索引收录情况，计算商品利润，一键下载主图，评论，Q&A等等
